channel.title: Should I release my server before using?
channel.description: Hi, I made a server, it's pretty awesome. I coded nazi zombies, IPlogs, a new train and all that shit. But my internet host blocked my 43594 port because I need to pay 2X what I pay to host a server and I pay 50-100$ months... I don't trust the hosters. I hosted on my friends router for some friends to test and Geo came on it and he said it's awesome for a BETA. Should I release it on mopar or any website because I don't think I would buy a VPS.

item.title: Should I release my server before using?
item.dc:creator: @drunk_mario drunk mario
item.description:
@drunk_mario wrote:

There are CHEAP Vps’s out there you could get…

Read full topic
item.source: Should I release my server before using?
